https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uY3dqX4GDkFb5jQ4yRnwNe3LiFK.jpg A candid, lyrical, intimate portrait of one family's struggle to transcend a fatal muscle wasting disease, Duchenne muscular dystrophy, which in turn becomes an unlikely celebration of the disabled life, the life cut short by rare disease. A Space in Time
